boolean_desc: Adds a checkbox representing a Boolean value (yes/no, enabled/disabled, etc.).
choice_desc: Allows to select one or more options from a list of predefined values.
currency_desc: Allows you to enter a monetary value using the currency defined for the platform.
date_desc: Allows enables you to enter or select a date in a calendar.
date-range_desc: Allows you to define a time period by entering its start and end dates.
email_desc: Allows you to enter an email address.
file_desc: Allows you to upload a file to the platform.
html_desc: Allows you to enter text with rich content (images, links, custom styles).
image_desc: Allows you to upload an image to the platform.
ip_desc: Allows you to enter an IP address.
number_desc: Allows you to enter a number.
string_desc: Allows you to enter free text.
url_desc: Allows you to enter a URL.
cascade_desc: Allows you to select a value from the predefined choice groups.
help_desc: Allows you to write a rich text of your choice.
